articles.title: "Illegal In The World, But Not In Pakistan": Wasim Akram On His Rehab Experience - NDTV Sports
articles.description: Wasim Akram has revealed that he was kept in a rehab in Pakistan for two-and-a-half months against his will. He also said that keeping someone against their will is "illegal in the world, but not in Pakistan".

articles.title: Muslim Body Weighs In On FIFA World Cup Craze In Kerala, Calls It 'Un-Islamic' - NDTV
articles.description: A Muslim body in Kerala on Friday came out against soccer-crazy youth in the state, who have erected cutouts of star-players in support of their teams participating in the ongoing World Cup by saying worshipping football celebrities is against Islam
